articles.content: The Champions League draw of Friday morning served up an enticing encounter between Premier League and La Liga's reigning champions Manchester City and Atletico Madrid, in the quarter-final stage of … [+1958 chars]

articles.author: James Cohen
articles.title: Arsenal: Martin Keown risks the wrath of Gunners fans by backing rivals Tottenham for top four spot - Daily Mail
articles.description: The former Arsenal defender said that because of each club's remaining fixtures, Antonio Conte's side are more likely to qualify for the Champions League than their London rivals.
articles.content:
Martin Keown has backed Tottenham to finish in fourth place come the end of the season, despite Arsenal being ahead currently.
The former Arsenal defender said that because of each club's remaining … [+2539 chars]

articles.author: Abdi Rashid
articles.title: Antonio Rudiger 'says YES to Juventus and agrees four-year deal' with Serie A giants - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 29-year-old is set to be out of contract at the end of the season and the Blues cannot offer him an extension because of UK government sanctions placed on club owner Roman Abramovich .
articles.content:
Chelsea's Antonio Rudiger has reportedly agreed to sign a four-year contract with Juventus this summer. 
The 29-year-old is set to be out of contract at the end of the season and the Blues cannot of… [+2093 chars]
